r4E.move|param|direction: choose between forward, backward, left and driveRight
r4E.move|param|seconds: tell the robot how long it should drive in seconds
r4E.move|param|speed: the speed of the robot from [0-16], optional argument
r4E.playMelody|param|melody: choose the melody you want the robot to play
r4E.turnMotor: move single motor forward or backward with given speed
